references.paper_title: Fully convolutional networks for semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many modern semantic segmentation methods, including the general methods used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Encoder-decoder with atrous separable convolution for semantic image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced a strong encoder-decoder architecture and was a significant improvement for semantic segmentation.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: The ResNet architecture introduced in this paper is widely used as the backbone in many computer vision tasks, including this paper's general semantic segmentation models.
This paper introduced a novel approach to improve the accuracy of semantic segmentation around object boundaries, which is relevant to the high-resolution focus of this paper.

references.paper_title: Swin Transformer: Hierarchical Vision Transformer using Shifted Windows
references.reason: This paper introduced the Swin Transformer, a highly effective Transformer-based architecture that is used in many state-of-the-art computer vision models, including this paper's general semantic segmentation models.
